channel.title: EMET on XenoBlog
channel.description: Recent content in EMET on XenoBlog

item.title: Adding Applications to EMET
item.description: If you have been using EMET (Enhanced Mitigation Experience Toolkit ) toolkit from Microsoft you probably have had to need to add custom application, one of the main “culprits” is Flash Player with its ever changing name (filename contains it’s version number) In EMET wildcards are only allowed in paths not filenames, so I wrote a little script to add applications to the EMET “Watch list” :) It consist of 2 functions one to remove an application and one to add an application.
